name: Vacuum Dynamics
description:
The game took 2 hours and 35 minutes to make

-------Info-------- You're a employee at "Vacuum Dynamics" your job is to test or fill as many vacuums as you can.
-----Controls----- Wasd for movement Mouse for rotating the player model, it doesn't actually have a purpose in movement. ---Download-- 1.Download the zip 2.Extract the zip file 3.Click the executable file in the extracted file
